name: Powerhouse AI
headline: Vision-powered warehouse automation: maximizing performance and value
description:
Powerhouse AI offers automation at a fraction of the cost of regular automation solutions. Enabling warehouses to become more competitive, fast. 

- How? By making warehousing as easy as taking pictures with a mobile device; digitizing processes and using the power of the camera to automate counting and checking tasks.

Four core functionality areas:

- Workflow Digitization: simplify and automate warehousing with AI powered workflows. 
- AI Counting: automate the tedious and error-prone counting of inventory. 
- AI Label Processing: scan everything [not just barcodes]. Fast. 
- AI Document Processing: reading logistics documents with the click of a button.  

Core benefits: de-risking and future-proofing your warehouse operations 

- Increasing efficiency and accuracy with 20% to 40%
- State-of-the-art technology
- Making “dumb” boxes smart 
- Easily deal with supplier data inconsistencies 
- Enabling a data driven way of working 
- Real-time access to data

founders.name: Kushal Pillay, Founder
founders.description:
Kushal's area of expertise is mainly in robotics & computer vision. Prior to starting his journey as an entrepreneur, he developed many unique computer vision models that help robots predict human movement to optimize their route, predict vandalism/threats, etc. but soon realized that robotics is not a one-size-fits-all solution due to 2 main reasons, cost and flexibility in usage.
Thus we aim to provide robot-grade tech in the hands of humans to help them maximize their productivity.

How Powerhouse AI is different from other scanners
Header| Powerhouse AI| Barcode Scanner| RFID Scanner  
---|---|---|---  
# of scans at a time| Multiple| Single| Single  
Data limitations| Extracts data beyond physical labels| Limited to preconfigured (your own) barcodes| CellLimited to preconfigured RFID tags  
Necessity for generating new labels  
Data extraction| Versatile data extraction (text, barcodes, QR codes, symbols, dimensions, etc.)| Short| Yes, but limited to unique identifier, limited product information, and tracking Information  
Scanning range| 5-10 feet| Short| Up to 3 feet  
Dependency on system to operate  
Durability| Long| Short| Long  
Document extraction (DO/PO/INV)  
Box Counting capability  
AI assisted instant verification  
Interface| User-friendly| Medium| Medium  
Making warehousing as easy as taking pictures
[AI Assisted Scanner](https://www.powerhouseai.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[Manager Cockpit](https://www.powerhouseai.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)
AI Assisted Scanner
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6676a27dc142b79bf6a39c78/6683be4a89dfae68e3ee1a8f_PWH_image_card.png)
Document Scanner
Extract and understand logistics documents to automate cross-checking and eliminate manual data entry to ERP/WMS systems.
Label Scanner
Scan multiple labels within a few seconds . Extract data beyond text/barcodes information like symbols, dimensions, expiry/ manf. dates
3D Vision Count
Count boxes on pallets from a single image and notify users of discrepancies.
Manager Cockpit
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6676a27dc142b79bf6a39c78/6683be4a4d72d127cd21d22f_PWH_image_card-1.png)
Monitor
Track every data point like accuracy, productivity of individual users/orders in real time and generate custom report with images.
Control
Manage operator-edited data, update processes, and notify necessary corrections directly from the cockpit to the operatos.
AI Assistance
Verify data, detect and notify managers of abnormalities for continuous improvement, and extract additional missed data from labels.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6676a27dc142b79bf6a39c78/6677cc7f9862d6f8416ac256_Bg-_slice_white.svg)
Control and streamline your warehouse processes with AI

generated_description:
**Powerhouse AI: Revolutionizing Warehouse Management**

Founded in 2021 and based in Singapore, Powerhouse AI is shaping the future of warehouse automation through innovative, vision-powered technology. Initially conceived to deliver automation at a fraction of the cost compared to traditional solutions, their mission is to maximize performance and value for warehouses. The idea is simple yet transformative—make managing warehouses as straightforward as snapping a photo with your mobile device.

### How They Do It

Powerhouse AI leverages advanced computer vision to digitize processes, automating tedious tasks like counting inventory and verifying shipments. Their platform revolves around four key functionalities:

1. **Workflow Digitization:** Streamlines and automates warehouse operations with AI-driven workflows.
2. **AI Counting:** Reduces the time and errors associated with manual inventory counting.
3. **AI Label Processing:** Scans and processes various types of labels—beyond just barcodes—quickly and effectively.
4. **AI Document Processing:** Simplifies reading logistics documents with a single click.

### Core Benefits

What does that translate to for the user? A more efficient and accurate warehouse operation with improvements of 20% to 40% in performance. Powerhouse AI’s technology not only enhances the smartness of “dumb” boxes but also allows companies to address inconsistencies in supplier data effortlessly. This creates a more data-driven approach to warehousing, providing real-time access to vital data.

### Team and Support

Currently a small but agile team of six, Powerhouse AI is part of Y Combinator's Batch W22. They have industry partnerships and success stories with notable clients like DHL and Unilever, showcasing their tangible impact on modern logistics operations. Their Group Partner, Nan, contributes to their growth and strategic direction.

### Unique Offering

What sets Powerhouse AI apart from conventional scanners? Their technology accommodates multiple scans at a time, extracts diverse data formats (including text, symbols, and dimensions), and operates effectively over longer distances. This level of versatility is a game-changer, fostering an environment of efficiency and reliability in warehouses.

In simple terms, Powerhouse AI is about making warehouses smarter and processes more efficient. Interested in transforming your warehouse operations? Ready to see how technology can simplify your logistics? Dive deeper at [Powerhouse AI’s website](https://www.powerhouseai.com) or schedule a demo to witness this innovation firsthand. 

Powerhouse AI is not just automating; they're redefining what a warehouse can achieve.
